name: searchDevices
shortDescription: Starts a device search for all supported device families
description: When you use this method, Homegear searches for new devices in all device families that support the method.

parameters.name: familyId
parameters.description: This is the ID of the family that you want to search for devices.

returnValue: Returns the number of devices that the method found or -2 if the search is run in background. If the latter is the case newly found devices are broadcast by newDevices().
